summary: This mod, as its name suggests, is an alternate start. You will be able to start the game on five different places, at the borders of Skyrim (Cyrodiil, Hammerfell, High Rock, Morrowind (South and North)).
descriptionHtml:
[color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b][color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]Content:[/b][/size][/color]

[/b][/size][/color]This mod, as its name suggests, is an alternate start. You will be able to start the game on five different places, at the borders of Skyrim:

[list]
[*]border to Cyrodiil,
[*]border to Hammerfell,
[*]border to High Rock,
[*]border to Morrowind (South and North).
[/list][color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]
Incompatibilities:[/b][/size][/color]

Use only one alternate start.

Do not use with other mods that modify the following quests:

[list]
[*]MQ101 "Unbound",
[*]MQ102 "Before the Storm",
[*]CW03 "Message to Whiterun".
[/list]
Do not use with other mods that modify the following cells:

[list]
[*]HelgenKeep01,
[*]WindhelmPalaceOfTheKings,
[*]SolitudeCastleDour,
[*]Wilderness 6, -29,
[*]Wilderness 4, -20,
[*]Wilderness 42, 9,
[*]Wilderness 51, -28,
[*]Wilderness -41, 24,
[*]Wilderness -13, -25.
[/list][color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]
[/b][/size][/color][b][color=#a4c2f4][size=4]Notes:[/size][/color][/b]

[list]
[*]Hadvar has been moved to Castle Dour, near General Tullius,
[*]Ralof has been moved to the Palace of the Kings in Windhelm, near Ulfric Stormcloak.
[/list][color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]
Starting the main and civil war quest lines:[/b][/size][/color]

[list]
[*]Your player will not witness the attack on Helgen but starting the main quest line and the civil war will always be possible.
[*]If you haven't visited Helgen yet, you'll have to bribe the guard so that he allows you to enter Whiterun and Jarl Balgruuf will not have proper lines for you.
[*]To start the main quest, you'll have to discover Helgen first. Once this done, go visit Jarl Balgruuf in Whiterun. The usual scene will not start but you can approach the Jarl and tell him that you want to help dealing with the dragon problem.
[*]To start the Civil War quest line, simply go to Solitude or Windhelm and enlist there, as usual.
[*]If you start the Civil War quest line before the main quest line, you'll have to discover Helgen. A quest will launch to that effect when you bring the "Message to Whiterun" to Jarl Balgruuf.
[/list]
[color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]Possible issue:[/b][/size][/color][list]
[*]Certain conflicting mods may prevent the Whiterun gate to be unlocked after you persuade the guard.. Being unable to reproduce the problem, I cannot fix it. If this happens to you, open the console, click on the gate and use the command "unlock" without the quotes.
[/list][color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]
Installation and removal:[/b][/size][/color]

[list]
[*]Download the archive and extract its content into your Data directory (Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data); do not extract the content of the .bsa file.
[*]Deinstalling this mod is not safe at all.
[/list]
[color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]Load order[/b][/size][/color][size=4][b]:[/b][/size]

[list]
[*]being an alternate start, this mod must be placed at the bottom of your list.
[/list][color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]
You can also find this mod on:[/b][/size][/color]

[list]
[*]TES Alliance: [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/2018-skyrim-skyrim-se-my-own-alternate-start/]http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/2018-skyrim-skyrim-se-my-own-alternate-start/[/url]ï»¿
[/list]
Enjoy!
author: anneschmidt
